Uses of Class
net.sourceforge.jiu.geometry.ResampleFilter

Packages that use ResampleFilter
net.sourceforge.jiu.geometry Operations to change the geometry of an image, mirroring it horizontally and vertically, shearing, scaling and rotating it 
 

Uses of ResampleFilter in net.sourceforge.jiu.geometry
 

Subclasses of ResampleFilter in net.sourceforge.jiu.geometry
 class BellFilter
          A Bell resample filter.
 class BoxFilter
          A box filter (also known as nearest neighbor).

          A B-spline resample filter.

          A Hermite resampling filter.

          The Mitchell resample filter.
 class TriangleFilter
          A triangle filter (also known as linear or bilinear filter).
